This past year has been a difficult one for all of us, but we have found new ways to support and connect with each other.

Canada and Hong Kong share deep and longstanding ties.

In the coming year, these connections will be even more meaningful to us all.

I wish all of Hong Kong to be safe, healthy and happy.
